WRITING.TEXT: Hey you . I have a couples tcounselor/therapist and i just saw a new therapist on friday because i desperately need one if i #8217;m going to get through this z. i was proactive because desperation called for a pretty immediate prospective therapist. i #8217;ve thought about support groups but i #8217;ve never been in a #8220;group #8221;, just therapy or facilities and specialized programs. it maybe would be nice to see people like me but my anxiety is also tell me to gtfo and not and hopefully this new therapist is any good and can help me at all otherwise i #8217;m not sure how long i can manage to hold out i wouldn #8217;t know how to get to a support group i don #8217;t drive, and that #8217;d be up to my partner if she has the free time and i t sounds daunting. i #8217;m open to the idea in a way though i don #8217;t have much to lose at this point i guess

I #8217;ve been in this situation before, after rape i snapped and attempted. psych wards are scary and rough. i personally am biased and i wanted to die because the pain was so much anguish and i felt token, used and worthless so i understand exactly why she wants to die. from your perspective you saved her life, from hers she probably doesn #8217;t know what to think and may be randomly resentful for some time for stopping her so to speak but she also desperately needs you. she #8217;s scared, i #8217;m sorry both of you are going through this. it won #8217;t be easy but in time it will numb some and that may be enough for her to begin healing. don #8217;t expect miracles and she may never return to #8220;normal #8221; but give her love and support and don #8217;t get mad at her. she is hurting beyond belief and felt she had no other option. being violated is the worst thing ever. just keep her safe and remember you #8217;ll have to be there for her more. don #8217;t suffocate her but be that gentle support, not a protective cage. i wish i could hug you both. she definitely will need a therapist, i needed that and medication. a friend support system is really good because it #8217;s hard to talk to older adults abou tthese things even in desperation. thank god you #8217;re visiting her in there. when i was visited it was a godsend and my only grip on love and reality. you #8217;re doing great. it #8217;s hard but you #8217;re obviously so loving and want to help so much. that goes a long way. also i was hella moody randomly for a while bursts of anger and self loathing will absolutely happen. i began abusing drugs and alcohol and self harmed more. don #8217;t freak out, just stay aware and don #8217;t helicopter her. don #8217;t send her to the ER for basic self harm. it #8217;s one of the only effective coping ways at first lt;3 sorry i #8217;m not good at collecting thoughts. // psych wards are terrifying and full of messed up people, drug addicts and legit crazy people. it can be unsafe and traumatizing. even staff sometimes do things that are extremely traumatizing and make it worse. in the future exhaust other options before sending her in a ward or hospital.
I will. Thank you. do you have any experience with groups? i don #8217;t know what to expect but i #8217;ll search

It gives a sense of peace knowing life is in ones hands. They have control over themselves. Its soothing. Its a reminder they have a safety net. They could even keep it at their desk every day in the open; so they see it regardless of the mood they are in. They know its there during the panic and the happiness, they know they are in control even in the anger and the sadness. It becomes calculated. Perhaps even it gives a sense of freedom to do things they wouldnt before. They have nothing to lose anymore and only things to gain. I hope you can find that something that makes you feel better. Everyone deserves happiness in any form.

is it wrong to not want someone to worry? No. You dont want to hurt anyone, ignorance perhaps is bliss. If you told him the truth what would happen? Would he feel like he failed and beat hismelf up? perhaps it would end in a different way. but you dont know how he would interpret the intent and what hed do with that information. youre afraid its a burden and what he doesnt know wont hurt him. you dont want other people to be in suffering too and telling them puts the weight on them as well to do something and save you, or failing trying to do so and living with that. is it wrong to want to minimize the amount it hurts them? No. You already know this.
which part of nonexistence is speaking to you? why do you hate existence so much gt;?

i can imagine most poeple would make jokes and it would blow over their heads and not even register but even if it is annoying to you, other people in the crowd may be suicidal and feel it makes them feel less alone and that theres awareness. even if its stupid, maybe its enough to give someone a spark of doubt in themselves about attempting. distraction is a powerful tool. but in your caseyou know all the feelings. it can be triggering. im sorry. i personally always hated awareness videos myself but maybe theres someone that it helps. or not. sorry you gots to listen to it. i hope the reminders arent too bad

hey you. sounds like you have a look into what happens to the "loved ones" when people pass away. That can definitely change any persons view of life and death. guilt or sadness in people hurts a lot and i imagine you feel torn. youve got some strong will to handle both sides of it at once. i dont think its that you dont have the balls, i think its because you clearly love your family and friends girlfriend passionately. You are a nice/friendly/good person to them even if you have dragons inside you. you may feel bad, but you treat them with love. That has nothing to do with confidence. You are fighting, not failing. you have some hella strong armor. also i wont tell you the masterful secrets written in the ancient tomes because those are forbidden spells. what I can say is that combo you said is totally throwup worthy and statistically ineffective. you say you dont want to wake up disabled, that method likes to backfire.

Hey so I have literally the exact same issue. sh on the face is something i used to ponder in the mirror too, especially cause not everything is symmetircal. honestly the reason i didnt actualy sh is because i didnt think i could get good symmety on my face and im a perfectionist and i was afriad id make it worse. so like i obviously cant tell you what to do but for me piercings, heavy eyeshaow etc helped alot. having piercings all over your face make ppl focus and notice pretty much only those for me now. i have a million on mine foir that purpose and it helped scar urges too. i dont think scars would be worth it anymore. what about hairline tattos or piercings? ever seen picture of people with like pretty tattoos on their side like near the eye? /also do you have a therapist you can talk to? or a doctor? getting stuff off your chest could feel good even if it doesnt solve it.

heya. i thought throwing in something silly and outlandish would be an amusing and noticeable way to deliver those words. even a smile is worth the randomness. sometimes i find its easier to compare things to fantastical things or other things to help put things in perspective in a lighthearted way. i dont know any actual roleplaying lingo. im glad i could touch you through all this pain going on for you. youre a tough cookie :)

Opening up to a therapist is daunting at times, but it can be so rewarding. Im glad youre thinking/moving towards getting a new one. also piercing look amazing on everyone. go for it. nose piercings are super cute and "in" these days. piercings i got to give false symmetry are snake bites, Largeseptum clicker, dahlia bites (corners of mouth/cheek), and middle of my cheeks. if youre considering scars, those types of piercings might suit you well. you could even think of it as professional *SH* and scars in a way. Those are the wounds people see, but its flashy and accepted. and pretty. it might be a good cover and help satiate those urges? either way the nose piercing is going to look awesome on you.

Have you exhausted all ways of clearing your debts? have you claimed bankruptcy yet? Im sorry you work so hard and it doesnt seem to be getting better. your boyfriend may really wishes the debt would go away but he wouldnt resent *you*. he may resent the debt even but not you. he loves you id imagine. Im sorry about the family situation. not having supports or a safety net from them is a hard one not going to lie. clearly they arent worth your time if they could just cut you off. Whats the degree? I dont know much but im curious what degreee you believe may not have potential when you get it.

its hard to hear that your family is partly responsible for your pain and cant seem to understand what youre going through. for writing Id imagine any piece you wrote for them would be something youd leave behind and give away. its a sliver of your mind, a glimpse of what you go through. you wont experience that closure though The past years sound like theyve been rough. Youve been fighting. or surviving. im glad youve had at least a tiny thing to fight for and motivate you.

I too am afriad to go back to the hospital and have reservations due to my partner and how it will affect them. I very much understand your post entirely. Im so sorry for what youve been through. hell and back countless times. in the hospital theres no responsibilities, the outside world isnt there anymore, you have people taking care of you. its a smaller world. routine. if you dont enjoy the days and your support network doesnt work or you cant handle it and you cant find happiness even in your hobbies then maybe you need a breather again. nothing wrong with that. this is you and your life. your partner and other people will fall into place around you. focus on you. if youre going to live and try, maybe rest and recuperate and over time youll find meds that help you stabilize. make that your goal if nothing else. get stable, find the right medication. do it as many times as you need. stress from you going to the hospital or facility to heal isfar better than if you were to be gone entirely and cutting ties wont change that. dont let guilt stop you from trying to heal.

I cant use Marijuana because it send me into paranoid hallucinating brain loops and I get suicidal. Ive self medicated using prescription medications, last night it was benzos. Im not opposed to being in a hospital other than i hate not being able to have my phone, Fighting with them to keep all of my face piercings and my clothes or see my partner. My partner is terrified of me going to a hospital and definitely wants to exhaust every other option first. Thats nightmare fuel for her. i do desperately need meds and i do feel like im gonna snap a lot. I have been trying to show her I want to get help for her. she wanted me to be only in a day program or get group therapy. so I called the pHP people and they said theyd call me back after I had talked to them on the phone. They never did, nor did they call my therapist. Their next soonest assessment if they wer to get bac to me asap would be up to about 2 weeks perhaps.

Hey so I have some really negative experiences especially in inpatient treatment for anorexia. I dont want to demotivate any progress or recovery youre heading towards so I didnt just post it. If you truly need inpatient then do it, but I personally would never in a million years go inpatient for an eating disorder again. Ive been inpatient, PHP and IOP. Good luck xox sorry youre struggling love.
oh gosh. I know some of us sare a handful and more than a lot of *normal* people can or are willing to handle. hopefully i havent pushed the limit. I have my hopes once I get meds I can salvage this.

That #8217;s not a bad idea for the time being. My current PCP doesn #8217;t ever do mental health meds and my Gf won #8217;t let me see random practitioners because of my drug abuse past and they have a lack of knowledge about my history or something. I can call and see if I can be put back on my last one if there are no med conflicts with my PCp. I guess until I can get a psych a short term prescription will do. I #8217;ll see if she will in this case since i #8217;ve been on it before. i #8217;m a bit desperate, and thanks you
I do! Its one of the huge struggles to stay in reality. I #8217;m sorry you have to go through it. hugs

Seroquel is a fun one. Hope it works for you. When I was on it i would sleep for half a day, wake up and be awake for up to two groggy hours even with pounding energy drinks, and promptly pass back out. I was extremely fatigued. Also my appetite became ravenous to the point where i #8217;d be binge eating so hard and yet even if i was over full or literally throwing up from the volume of food i felt like i was starving. That being said, when I was awake i felt detached from reality and hazy but I liked the feeling. On lower doses I could stay awake a little longer but concentration was a no go. try not to fall asleep while walking ;) Also I #8217;m glad you opened up about your delusions. It #8217;s scary to admit to someone but hopefully you now get the treatment and help you need to be okay! GL
Ive been doing it for 11 years. I can confirm it becomes a consuming addiction. Be careful xoxo
